solution_line_template: Wally gives his friends {fraction_given_numerator}/{fraction_given_denominator}*{total_tickets} = <<{fraction_given_numerator}/{fraction_given_denominator}*{total_tickets}={tickets_given_to_friends}>>{tickets_given_to_friends} tickets to share.

The total ratio that represents the tickets that Jensen and Finley share is {jensen_ratio_part}+{finley_ratio_part} = <<{jensen_ratio_part}+{finley_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

From the total ratio, the fraction that represents the share that Finley got is {finley_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}, and since he shared with Jensen {tickets_given_to_friends} tickets, he got {finley_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}*{tickets_given_to_friends} = <<{finley_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}*{tickets_given_to_friends}={finley_tickets}>>{finley_tickets} tickets
